Title: Pattie Sue Edwards (No. 68)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Carla Kettner, Marisa Tam (story editor), Taylor Martin (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Amir Arison
Plot: As Liz continues tracking Tom's killers, Red tries to solve a tax issue in his money laundering. Meanwhile, Aram goes out to the field when the Task Force investigates a viral outbreak.
